definitions.definition: The affixing of a label to potentially dangerous machinery to indicate why it has been shut down . To avoid accidents , only the person who affixed the label is authorized to remove it and restart the machinery.
examples: After lockout, don't forget tagout — you have to communicate to others what the status is.

main_definition: The affixing of a label to potentially dangerous machinery to indicate why it has been shut down . To avoid accidents , only the person who affixed the label is authorized to remove it and restart the machinery.
